attributes.action: give police more powers to deal with antisocial behaviour
attributes.additional_details: Many incidences of violence intimidation , thefts etc
attributes.background: The town where I live is being blighted with serious anti social behaviour , thefts violence intimidation etc , caused by gangs of youths who are known to the police and council , our businesses and lively hoods are being affected , footfall in the town has dropped

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what powers you'd like the police to have. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
